author: billbarker
msg: This will make it easier to extend to non-Sun JVMs later.
Also, adding in additional second-try at guessing that will allow procrun to recover from at least some of the common JVM installation errors.
Finally, adding in support to specify JAVA_HOME via the --Environment configuration option, so that it is possible to configure different services to use different JVM installs.

author: billbarker
msg: Add locations to look for the jvm.cfg file.
It seems that Sun has moved the file location, at least for some 1.4.x versions on Solaris.

author: billbarker
msg: Allow the ability to pass multiple arguments to the startup and shutdown methods.
Based on patch Submitted By: Ryan M. Graham <ryan@ELOQUENT-SYSTEMS.com>

author: billbarker
msg: Don't call the signal handler registered by the JVM.
We're changing the symantics of the signal, so it doesn't make sense to fall back on the JVM's symantics.  What is worse, is that the old code prevented a clean shutdown.

author: billbarker
msg: This is meant to be a full License, not a reference License.
